events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund because it does not match what I paid for.
The issue has been reviewed and categorized as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle your refund request for the incorrect item.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear you received the wrong item. Iâ€™m here to help resolve your refund request as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received along with your order number to verify the issue?
I have attached photos of the item received and my order confirmation number is 582931. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send a prepaid shipping label for the wrong item return.
Thank you for the quick response. I appreciate the prepaid label and refund processing. Looking forward to it.
Your refund has been processed successfully and the return label has been emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are following up to ensure you received your refund and the return shipment was completed without issues.
As your refund has been processed and return completed, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
